message: The convore iPhone app just came out http://t.co/cBfVuhO
Still kinda buggy but they wanted to get it out the door before SXSW
Any word on an android app?
They didn't even make it, someone just liked convore a lot and was an andorid user, so they used the API to build their own haha

Yeah, Android users tend to get shit done themselves.
